channel.title: Social Phone Food Concerts Worldbook Matiss Hiromi Restaurant Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Social Phone Food Concerts Worldbook Matiss Hiromi Restaurant Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: party
item.description: so my party was fun. I had a good time. it was great fun to see everyone. I was disappointed that some people didn’t get a chance to show up. but whatever. I now know who my real friends are. haha. umm jk. or am I ;) we had a huge number of people turn out and we ended up drinking all my beers and wines. it was quite nice. john from work stopped by.
